tool_description:
Get live football/soccer scores, transfers, fixtures, and results with our API. Stay updated with the latest football information effortlessly. 

Update: Latency reduced and added more options!
name: Soccer/Football Live Info
title: Soccer/Football Live Info

api_list.name: Get Match
api_list.description: This endpoint returns the match information.

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description:
match id from goal.com. i.e: dlklpkvgkqwmaf1q5wu73omc4.

Example the id, it's usually appears at the very end of the last "/". https://www.goal.com/en/match/nottingham-forest-vs-arsenal/dlklpkvgkqwmaf1q5wu73omc4

api_list.name: Get Transfers (deprecated)
api_list.description:
Retrieves the latest football transfers.

**Parameters:**
**pagination** (optional): Specifies the page number for pagination (default: 1).

Functionality: This endpoint retrieves the latest football transfer information. It retrieve data such as transfer links, images, titles, teams involved, timestamps, and teasers. 

If desired, you can specify the pagination parameter to access different pages of transfer data.

api_list.name: Get Scores by Date
api_list.description:
Retrieves football results by date.

**Parameters:**
**date**: Specifies the date for which you want to retrieve the results (format: YYYY-MM-DD).

Functionality: This endpoint allows you to retrieve football results for a specific date. It fetches data such as league names, round details, start dates, team names, scores, and match results. 

By providing a date parameter, you can get the results for a specific day.

api_list.name: Get Live Scores
api_list.description:
This endpoint retrieves real-time data, including league names, round details, start dates, team names, scores, and match results.

This endpoint provides up-to-date information on ongoing matches.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://soccer-football-live-info.p.rapidapi.com/getLive"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "soccer-football-live-info.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://soccer-football-live-info.p.rapidapi.com/getLive"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "soccer-football-live-info.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
